Title: The Black Widow
Plot: Ben takes Bobby under his wing in a hope to destroy Hank and Jean.  However, Ben's mental state is starting to crack.  Cooper starts to look at buying real estate.  Major Briggs's supervisor reveals that Briggs was studying transmissions from the woods.  Andy and Dick learn of Little Nicky's troubled life.  James meets Malcom, the chauffer for the Marsh family.  Dougie Milford dies on his honeymoon, and the major blames Lana.  Cooper finds drugs at Dead Dog Farms.  Dick thinks Nicky is trying to
GuestStars: David Duchovny, Tony Burton, Tony Jay, Nicholas Love, Ron Taylor, John Apicella, Joshua Harris, Geraldine Keams, Molly Shannon, John Epstein
